title: Getting Started with NextJS
excerpt: NextJS is a the React framework for production - it makes building fullstack React apps and sites a breeze and ships with built-in SSR.

title: Mastering JavaScript
excerpt: JavaScript is the most important programming language for web development. You probably don't know it well enough!

title: Create Custom React Video Player - Part 1
excerpt: Create a custom video player in React - build a layout of video player with CSS in a responsive way.

title: Create Custom React Video Player - Part 2
excerpt: Create a custom video player in React - add a video functionality to built UI such as playback, volume, progress, fullscreen and etc.

title: Create Custom React Video Player - Part 3
excerpt: Create a custom video player in React - implement Adaptive Bitrate Streaming to allow to play format like HLS or MPEG.

title: AWS VOD Streaming - Upload Video to AWS S3
excerpt: Build a video-on-demand (VOD) streaming app with AWS - allow users to upload video to AWS S3 with multipart upload and presigned url.

title: AWS VOD Streaming - Convert Video with AWS Lambda & MediaConvert
excerpt: Build a video-on-demand (VOD) streaming app with AWS - convert uploaded video to adaptive media format (CMAF) with AWS Lambda and MediaConvert.
